message: Bob, I'm offering you the product for $1,750,000.  I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product to you, but I am not able to meet the price of $1,750,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,600,000. I hope this is a price you can consider. Looking forward to your response!

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While $1,600,000 is closer to my desired price, I'm still not quite there yet.  I'm willing to come down to $1,650,000.  This reflects the value of the product to you, but also allows me to make a fair profit.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am unable to meet the price of $1,650,000. I would like to make one final counteroffer of $1,625,000. I hope this proposal is within your consideration range.
